Champion or relegation |- bgcolor=gold | 1. ||style="text-align:left;"| Proleter Zrenjanin ||29||18||14||1||3||1264||1111 |- align=center | 2. ||style="text- align:left;"| Olimpija ||25||18||11||3||4||1186||959 |- align=center | 3. ||style="text-align:left;"| Partizan ||24||18||10||4||4||1225||1117 |- align=center | 4. ||style="text-align:left;"| Crvena Zvezda ||23||18||10||3||5||1179||1095 |- align=center | 5. ||style="text- align:left;"| Ljubljana ||21||18||9||3||6||1250||1178 |- align=center | 6. ||style="text-align:left;"| Lokomotiva ||17||18||8||1||9||1110||1158 |- align=center | 7. ||style="text-align:left;"| Sloboda Tuzla ||15||18||7||1||10||927||965 |- align=center | 8. ||style="text-align:left;"| Montažno ||14||18||7||0||11||1156||1194 |- align=center style="background:#FFC0CB" | 9. ||style="text-align:left;"| Mladost ||9||18||3||3||12||1049||1244 |- align=center style="background:#FFC0CB" | 10. ||style="text-align:left;"| Radnički Belgrade ||3||18||1||1||16||1037||1362 |} The winning roster of Proleter Zrenjanin: * Vilmos Lóczi * Dušan Radojčić * Ljubomir Katić * Milutin Minja * Lajos Engler * Aleksandar Tornjanski * Ferenc Kurc * Laslo Rošival * Đura Bjeliš * Branimir Lipovčević * Ante Šeparević * Jovan Kifer * Pavle Skorobrin * Miroslav Mirosavljević * Lajoš Šifliš Coach: Vojislav Stankov ==References== Category:Yugoslav First Basketball League seasons
title: 1956 Yugoslav First Basketball League
